ActJudges Act
SubjectRobin Brine ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. David J. Brine
PrecisGranting of an annuity to ROBIN BRINE, widow of the Honourable David J. Brine, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective November 7, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
